description: Try our easy to follow Beef, Lentil & Tomato Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lentil salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Beef, Lentil & Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place lentils into a saucepan with 3 cups cold water. Bring lentils to the boil over high heat, reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes until just tender. Drain.

Meanwhile, heat 1 tbs of the oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Season steaks on both sides with salt and pepper. Add to pan and cook for 3 minutes each side for medium rare or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate and rest for 5 minutes.

Whisk remaining oil, vinegar, garlic, mustard and honey together in a jug. Set aside. Combine lentils, tomato, onion and half of the dressing in a serving bowl. Thinly slice steak and add to salad with rocket. Add feta and capers and serve with remaining dressing.
